comments.comment: Bjorn is gonna be running around in the vlogs soon
Seeing him grow from awkward gamer to cool caring dad has been really fun to watch alongside
Björn just poops, eats and hates trains, and it’s enough for us to give him unconditional love. What a legend
You know he’s a true gamer when he refers to his baby as “interactive”
Seeing Marzia and Felix enjoy each other and do fun things is so heartwarming, and seeing how much they love Bjorn is so beautiful.

Not really sure how to even describe how it’s felt watching Felix the last couple of years. Obviously we don’t know each other, but growing up and going through my own life experiences and watching Felix go through his at the same time, it very much feels like cheering on a distant friend as he lives his dream.
It feels like such a privilege getting to see Marzia and Felix fall in love with Bjorn and enjoying parenthood.
I am so glad that Felix can go to places like a trampoline park in Japan without being swarmed.

These vlogs are like the extra chapters of a manga after the story is over. The “happily ever after part”
So wholesome
Seeing Pewds around Bjorn and talking about him is adorable lol. Feels like an out of character moment but wholesome indeed.
Its honestly so heartwarming to see PewDiePie genuinely enjoying his life

I'll be back here 5 years later. To see how much Bjorn has grown. First pewds "raised" me. Now I'm watching pewds raising his son. Wow... I'll never forget this family till I get old. Pewds and Marzia became a special part of me since my childhood and now Bjorn is in the family. It's the sweetest thing ever to see in YouTube history for me.
Bjorn is going to be the ultimate multilingual.... English, Swedish, Italian and Japanese
Very happy for you guys
Seeing pewds go from an awkward gamer making lets plays on amnesia to a proud father living his best life brings me a joy i cannot explain.

Absolutely mental to see pewds go from happy wheels, crying at horror games, to being a husband and father.

All in front of us too. Shows how fast life comes at you.
From the funniest unhinged YouTuber to an amazing calm dad, you're a legend and truly an inspiration Pewds!

From being a 13 year old kid  watching you play horror games to being a 26 year old with a family of my own its been one hell of a journey to grow alongside you and to see how far you've come is so awesome  So happy for you both and baby Björn
Watching these seriously fulfills my childhood/teenage self wishing the best for pewds and Marzia  you guys are the cutest. Happy, beautiful family🩷
From taking stephano everywhere, to taking your son everywhere. It's so great to see how far you've come... And how far us, the viewers, have come. I wish the best for your family and future

The more I watch these vlogs, the more I realize what an incredible life Felix has. He’s pretty much retired at a young age and doing what he loves, living a modest, happy and content life with what he has.
The fact we all grew up with felix, it’s a weird feeling seeing him grow so much too. From the gamer screaming at barrels to the man that has it all… proud of him fr
The genuine joy in yours and your wife's eyes is absolutely top level endearing, Pewds. That's pure serotonin right there.

literally idk why but im crying looking at bjorn, he doesnt even know it but hes already loved by millions of people around the world
seeing felix and marzia grow up over he yrs has been so rewarding
PewDiePie just being a Japan vlogger is the best timeline we could be living in
Thank you Felix for letting us participate in this important part of your life!
Honestly, I like this new format of what Felix is doing. Seeing people genuinely happy and content is so much better than manufacturing videos for views ^^
Hearing Pewds speak Russian all of a sudden at 6:22 was really unexpected to me
The pure joy that Felix has on his face when looking at his son is so heartwarming. Him and Marzia are fantastic parents.
the way bjorn's face lights up with joy when he sees felix is so wholesome
I bet 10 years ago you’d be in disbelief of what you’ve accomplished and I’m so happy I’ve grown up watching you

The Growth of this man is amazing, I miss when he used to play Amnesia during my highschool years and sleeping on the tablet when he was just making them videos was one of the best times of my life. Thank you Pewds for being an amazing person despite all the bs the media portray you as.
Man won life at this point. He has a loving wife, a handsome son, and a wholesome community. After all he been through, he deserves it.

This warms my heart. I've been watching Felix for over 10 years. I can't believe he's a Dad now and Marzia is a mom. It's like I watched a big brother grow up. I'm so happy for you three and your beautiful family.
seeing pewds grow and mature and be a happy dad and husband is the most beautiful thing ever
Melts my heart to see Pewds all grown up. After seeing him doing the most bizarre shit almost everyday , it's almost surreal seeing him like this.
Very happy for you guys.
So happy to see how much bjorn is taking care of pewds and marzia. Really wholesome
Man's living a good life. Never been happier for someone like this. Well deserved

i have a feeling when bjorn gets older, he’ll want to sheild us much more from bjorn’s life, and possibly even step away from youtube completely… but for now, i am SO grateful to get to watch this journey!!♡︎ he seems like such a sweet dad and it has been so lovely to watch him and marzia grow into parents  ♡︎ love u felix

These vlogs genuinely make me so happy. Bjorn's smile and laugh is so precious, he's a very lucky kid to have Pewds and Marzia as his parents. I wish you nothing but the very best Felix, I hope your little family stays healthy and happy <3
Your entire family is shining with happiness. It's precious to watch, thank you for bringing us with you! Bjorn's laugh and little sounds are adorable.
13:00 - Pewds straight up giving his child a gameplay review LMAO
Так приятно видеть счастье их семьи! Надеюсь они навсегда останутся такими же замечательными
As someone who has been watching Felix since his early Amnesia days, it makes my heart so full and happy seeing him as a father.

This is for Marzi cause I can tell when you edit the videos gurl: Thank you so much for incluiding clips of you with baby Bjorn!! Is so cute and heartwarming seeing you too  in this new phase of your life. You guys are handleling parenting so well. Wish you the best ALWAYS!
With the chaos that's happening around the world, a PewDiePie video feels like a place to rest and take in a deep breath
Ten years ago I watched pewds scream in gmod and now he really looks like a dad this is the most wholesome thing I’ve ever seen
Pewdiepie really does have it all, a career that he loves that supports him/family, a loving wife that's been with him since day 1, and now a beautiful son. Pewd's has it all. Super happy for them.

I usually don't care for vlogs, but this got me. seeing Pewds being a dad is so sweet & then seeing how lovely him & Marzia still are. I just can't. I wish them all the best & can't wait to watch Björn grow up. jeez, who's cutting onions??

Looking at the skyline
7:13 
“Someday this will be all yours Bjorn”
heart melts
Watching your vlogs feels as if I'm reading a really wholesome romantic slice-of-life manga. Wishing you and your family the best in the future Pewds
I am just loving the fact that a child could be born to a nice loving intelligent couple.  It makes me cry so much, such joy.  I hope this content lasts forever.
I've been a fan of PewDiePie since I was a kid and seeing him now with a loving wife and a cute baby makes me so happy.

Marzia showing the book to Bjorn made me cry 🥹 
I’m so happy for you guys and your little family. Bless you guys

watching pewds after years, feels like bumping into an old friend from high school you spent so much time with but lost contact with. Glad to see pewds is really happy where he is now. Thanks for growing up with me bruv.

This is honestly the best story for big youtubers

taking a step back and choosing family over career and living out a comfortable and happy life 

felix and marzia seem like the best parents anyone could have
You can just tell that they're both wonderful parents  so loving and appreciating every moment. Thank you so much for letting us see this part of your life Felix

So nice to see Marzia out having fun, glad you're having fun and doing things for yourself. Parents always forget to look after themselves and love each other, take care guys, super happy for you and Bjorn!
It makes me so happy that he remembers Ib, such a good game and what a nostalgic moment for him to bring it up

As a recent dad (my baby boy is 4 months old now)
It's really good to have this kind of content on the internet 
Because I don't think I can ever describe how it is to be a father 
The amount of love is just unfathomable
I'm not doing a great job at explaining myself, but I just think that more people should experience it or at least see how it is 
Love to you all
7:34 What a shot Bjorn! Chad is already holding the camera for his parents
I don't know why but I always get emotionally happy whenever I see Pewds settling in with the father life in Japan. I am nothing to him but we've come a long way my guy. So happy for you.
POV: you're smiling behind the screen as you watch this man becoming matured everyday over the years

These vlogs legitimately bring a tear to my eyes at how heart warming and wholesome their life is. They both deserve it, thank you pewds for all the entertainment and pseudo companionship throughout the years.

The audio that Marzia edits for the vlogs is always so interesting and soothing. The music complements the flow of the video clips in a way that really enhances the video as a whole. It’s nice to see editing done with such care and consideration for each aspect of it.
By far the best part was Felix smiling at Bjorn 12:23 It’s so sweet
I love these videos. They feel so real and calming, with the Japanese subtitles, calming music in the background, and filters. This is like comfort food in video form
Bjorn is so beautiful.
It’s so good seeing Pewds live his best life with his family
IM SO GLAD TO BE LIVING ON THIS ERA OF PEWD, U DESERVE ALL OF THIS AND WE'RE SO HAPPY FOR YOU.

These vlogs have become my new favorite type of videos Pewds does. I used to miss him doing let's plays but I'm over that now and really enjoy his adventures in Japan. Especially now with baby Bjorn ️

Throughout the years, regardless of the type of content Pewds makes, it's always been an antidepressant. Recently, it's been getting super wholesome. Really happy to see Daddie Pewdie, Mommie Marzie, and Baby Bjorn having lots of fun! Sending y'all lots of love! <3
8:00 He's doing THE BROFIST !!
I missed Marzia! This video realllly showed her funny personality. Most vlogs she's totally behind the scenes but its so great to see her joking around on camera again :)

Congratulations on your beautiful baby boy. He’s gorgeous and I’m so happy to see you happy. 
Life is good. 
God bless you and your beautiful family
Watching Marzia flip tables is best described as "adorable rage".
Pewds out here living the best life. We're all so happy for you man!
I’m at a rough time in my life but watching Pewds reminds me that there are happy kind people out there.  I hope he and his family continue to thrive.  That baby is so happy and loved.
Wish the best for you and your family. Don't think i can have kids, but you're living every mans dream.

Fun fact from a Speech Therapist: Babies are "universal listeners" beginning at 6 months old until about 8-10 months. Meaning they can pick up on the tiniest of differences between all the languages!

So happy and excited for you both as baby Bjorn develops in leaps and bounds within the next couple months! Truly is an amazing time from a communication/speaking/joint attention stand point.
Dude I can’t imagine just having endless money and endless time to just do what you want and to take life at your own pace like wow you made it Felix. You really have.
Ive just became a father myself and im so happy we came this far Felix! Keep up the good spirits and cherish all those moments. When they're so small you will honestly miss it hard.
I’m literally crying tears of joy, thank you Pewds for this amazing video
One day Bjorn will flex that his dad is pewdiepie and will be the coolest kid in town. Happy for you guys! Keep it up Felix and Marzia

3:57 
Dude that kid loves you so much already. That's amazing. The kid likes PewDiePie, he's the youngest 9yo ever.
I love how Felix always carries little Björn and don't leave all the work to Marzia. Such a good dad and a cool husband! Can't wait to see Björn run around on future uploads!
Just realized Bjorn will  grow up to be atleast trilingual since Italian + Swedish parents who communicate mainly in English and are living in Japan. What a great time to be an uncle

This vlogs are an instant dopamine boost, I always end up smiling like an idiot while watching them 
Thank you so much for sharing with us, Pewds!
Was just in Yokohama for Pokemon World Championships; so cool seeing the area again through your eyes!
I'm teary eyed watching this, this is so wholesome and I'm very happy for the both of you pewds and marzia.
Imagine how intelligent Bjorn would be, he could speak 4 languages, Swedish, Italian, English and Japanese
seeing pewds is like a reminder we all are growing and its bitter sweet, love you pewds <3
baby looks really cute. hope he would be a healthy, well and happy boy growing up. congratz felix and marzia for this amazing achievement.
Bjorn is so lucky! He has marzia as mom and dad as felix. 2 person who can understand and do better for him forever.

Bjorn is such a cutie, he's definitely getting mroe talkative! It's so so nice to see Marzia and you just interacting with your baby, talking to him and just reading books, it's so cute and wholesome. I look forward to more vlogs with him, you and Marzia in the future! You're both doing amazing! ^^
12:08 Bjorn is soooo Cute it fills me with joy to see him smile! Pewds and Marzia are really doing a great job being parents!
We are all so proud of you growing into a real father.
I've been watching you Felix since 2009 and to watch you and Marzia throughout the years has been great. Congratulations again to you both on your baby boy and all the best!!
